short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import custom data queries or reports from Salesforce into Notion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience seamless integration between Salesforce and Notion and take your productivity to the next level with our Chrome extension. With this add-on, you can pull Salesforce data directly into your Notion workspace.

- Search and select Salesforce objects and their corresponding fields, ensuring that only the data you need is imported.
- Choose which Salesforce reports to import
- Have a complete control over which data to import into Notion by using SOQL editor
